summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6015 for the construction of a trunk sewer known as the West Montlake Trunk Sewer, in 15th Avenue North from Boyer Avenue to Calhoun Street, and certain other streets, avenues and easements, under Ordinance No. 81179 as amended by Ordinance No. 81949, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
